you often wear the magic you eat
if i die, i will return
you have far to go, do not give up
i do not miss my nose here
some chests are not what they appear
the drow see through this darkness
time does not pass in the overworld
all that is holy is good
do not speak the name of he who comes
do not give up on me
i should not have left you
death holds my flesh to random
i see a way to return
i have no tongue, but these bones cut stone
